Text: Been looking for this for quite a while. Cheers
thank you.classis movie keep up the good work

Im sorry i have to write this... i downloaded this for my 3.5yr old thinking it would be a good film.. but i have to let other people know that this film is a REALLLY BAD film, really really bad!!! and i had to delete it after she watched it so that she'll never watch it again.. it has some really dark underlying themes running through it.... dont waste your time...
This is a Great Tom Jerry Movie Classic Movie keep up the good work. Don't listen to the comment cause it is a good movie.
This is an excellent film. It has no dark underlying themes running through it, that's just rubbish. Every generation of children grew up with Tom & Jerry; it's a animated film for kids, that's all.

Its ok. The kid I showed it to seemed to like it. I remember I liked it when I was little. I didn't see why such critisism is on this, sure, its not the same as the lil episodes. But it still is good. When I was little I enjoyed it more than the small series. While grown up, sure small series win by longrun, but this doesn't change what experience I had when little.
